statements: UPDATE ligament_tendon_properties SET elasticity = 0.75, tensile_strength = 200 WHERE ligament_tendon_id = 1;
UPDATE ligament_tendon_properties SET tendon_name = 'Achilles Tendon', elongation = 0.2 WHERE ligament_name = 'Knee Ligament';
UPDATE ligament_tendon_properties SET elasticity = 0.75, tensile_strength = 500 WHERE ligament_tendon_id = 1;
UPDATE ligament_tendon_properties SET elongation = 0.5, tendon_name = 'Example Tendon' WHERE ligament_tendon_id = 2;
UPDATE Ligaments SET stiffness = 10.5, elasticity = 8.2 WHERE ligament_id = 1;
UPDATE Tendons SET flexibility = 6.7, strength = 12.1 WHERE tendon_id = 3;
UPDATE Ligaments SET stiffness = 0.75, elasticity = 0.8 WHERE ligament_id = 1;
UPDATE Tendons SET flexibility = 0.9, strength = 0.85 WHERE tendon_id = 2;
UPDATE ligament_data SET rehabilitation_protocol='Physiotherapy' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE tendon_data SET injury_type='Sprain', rehabilitation_progress='Good' WHERE id=2;
UPDATE ligament_data SET rehabilitation_protocol = 'Aggressive plan', injury_type = 'Sprain' WHERE patient_id = 101 AND ligament_type = 'ACL';
UPDATE tendon_data SET rehabilitation_progress = 'Progressing well', injury_type = 'Tendonitis' WHERE patient_id = 201 AND tendon_type = 'Achilles';

UPDATE tendon_properties SET tensile_strength = 200.75 WHERE tendon_id = 2;

UPDATE ligaments SET stiffness = 25.7 WHERE name = 'ACL Ligament';
UPDATE tendons SET strength = 35.2, flexibility = 12.6 WHERE id = 3;
